Character.DisplayName: Village Headman
Character.Description: The desperate leader of a village plagued by bandits

Character.DisplayName: Bandit Lookout
Character.Description: A scout who watches the roads for easy prey

Character.DisplayName: Bandit Tōryō
Character.Description: A scarred enforcer who maintains order among the sanzoku through fear and blade

Character.DisplayName: Bandit Oyabun
Character.Description: A ruthless gang leader who rules through fear and strength

Character.DisplayName: Captured Rice Merchant
Character.Description: A trembling merchant held hostage for ransom from his wealthy clan

Character.DisplayName: Hi no Kami
Character.Description: An ancient fire spirit dwelling within the sacred volcano

Character.DisplayName: Kaji no Shogun
Character.Description: A warrior spirit of living flame that guards the inner sanctum

Character.DisplayName: Worried Temple Elder
Character.Description: A village elder who fears the wandering monk's growing influence over the people

Character.DisplayName: The Holy Wanderer
Character.Description: A charismatic figure who claims divine enlightenment

Character.DisplayName: Fervent Disciple
Character.Description: A zealous follower who has surrendered their worldly goods to the holy man

Character.DisplayName: Disillusioned Pilgrim
Character.Description: A former believer whose faith shattered when they witnessed the truth

Character.DisplayName: Temple Sōhei
Character.Description: A warrior monk sworn to protect the holy wanderer with their life

Character.DisplayName: Suspicious Kannushi
Character.Description: A Shinto priest investigating rumors of false miracles and stolen offerings

Character.DisplayName: Antique Dealer
Character.Description: An eccentric collector of curiosities who found a strange scroll among old estate goods

Character.DisplayName: Domain Historian
Character.Description: A learned scholar who has spent decades studying the region's buried secrets

Character.DisplayName: Mountain Sennin
Character.Description: An ancient recluse who has witnessed the comings and goings of the mountain for generations

Character.DisplayName: Rival Treasure Seeker
Character.Description: A calculating ronin who has pieced together clues to the same hidden fortune

Character.DisplayName: Stone Guardian
Character.Description: An ancient construct protecting the treasure

Character.DisplayName: Traveling Storyteller
Character.Description: A wanderer who collects and shares legends

Character.DisplayName: Hermit Swordmaster
Character.Description: The last living practitioner of an ancient sword art

Character.DisplayName: Disgraced Student
Character.Description: A bitter wanderer who was cast out for lacking the spiritual purity required

Character.DisplayName: Ambitious Swordsman
Character.Description: A skilled warrior determined to learn the legendary technique at any cost

Character.DisplayName: Mountain Path Elder
Character.Description: An aged guide who remembers when the master still accepted students

Character.DisplayName: Troubled Grandmother
Character.Description: An elderly woman whose precious family heirloom was stolen

Character.DisplayName: Watchful Neighbor
Character.Description: A neighbor who noticed something suspicious that night

Character.DisplayName: Desperate Ronin
Character.Description: A masterless warrior driven to theft by hard times

Character.DisplayName: Back-Alley Merchant
Character.Description: A dealer who trades in goods of questionable origin

Character.DisplayName: Village Elder
Character.Description: A wise elder leading their people to safety

Character.DisplayName: Young Farmer
Character.Description: A determined youth who wants to protect their people

Character.DisplayName: Village Herbalist
Character.Description: A skilled healer carrying precious medicines salvaged from the volcanic destruction

Character.DisplayName: Mysterious Rōnin
Character.Description: A silent warrior who joined the refugees with no explanation of their past

Character.DisplayName: Lost Farmboy
Character.Description: A frightened child separated from his family during the panicked evacuation

Character.DisplayName: Ashigaru Scout
Character.Description: A foot soldier tracking the refugees for the warlord who claims their lands

Character.DisplayName: Samurai Captain
Character.Description: A ruthless commander ordered to capture or eliminate the fleeing villagers

Character.DisplayName: Checkpoint Samurai
Character.Description: A guard at the domain border who must decide whether to grant passage

Character.DisplayName: Trade Master
Character.Description: The calculating leader of your merchant association

Character.DisplayName: Za Enforcer
Character.Description: A burly figure who protects the merchant guild's interests with intimidation

Character.DisplayName: Rival Za Master
Character.Description: The cunning leader of a competing merchant association seeking dominance

Character.DisplayName: Rival Za Lieutenant
Character.Description: The rival guild master's trusted second who handles their dirty work

Character.DisplayName: Shinobi Informant
Character.Description: A shadow who trades secrets to the highest bidder, loyal to coin alone

Character.DisplayName: Domain Magistrate
Character.Description: A stern official who mediates trade disputes according to the daimyō's law

Character.DisplayName: Rival Za Muscle
Character.Description: A former wrestler who breaks bones for the competing merchant guild

Character.DisplayName: Itinerant Peddler
Character.Description: A shrewd trader who travels the dangerous roads between towns

Character.DisplayName: Sekisho Guard
Character.Description: A checkpoint official who demands transit taxes on all goods passing through

Character.DisplayName: Roadside Nusubito
Character.Description: A desperate thief who ambushes travelers on the mountain paths

Character.DisplayName: Castle Town Merchant
Character.Description: A prosperous shopkeeper eager to acquire exotic goods from afar

Character.DisplayName: Wealthy Patron
Character.Description: A rich collector representing a noble house seeking rare commodities

Character.DisplayName: Hatagoya Master
Character.Description: A jovial innkeeper whose roadside lodge is a haven for weary travelers
